Items.Name: THE BASIC
Items.Description: A little bit of everything to please any specimens likings. Every tavern should list this drink so that no guest dries out.

Items.Name: CÖFI
Items.Description: Bitter but refreshing. Many people insist on only being able to converse in the morning after chugging a Cöfi.

Items.Name: NEW BASIC+
Items.Description: Nearly the same as The Basic but more expensive and strenuous thus it has to be better, right?!

Items.Name: PINE CULADE
Items.Description: Some say they use actual pines in this drink.
